name: WP Spam IP
author: Damir Calusic

sections.description:
WP Spam IP works right away when you activate the plugin. No more settings needed. The IP’s in the plugin will be added automatically to your Comment Blacklist.

When a comment comes from an IP adress located in the Comment Blacklist the comment will be marked as spam right away. The plugin does not delete anything and it is up to you if you want to delete the comment or not.
sections.installation:
1. Upload wp-spam-ip folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the \’Plugins\’ menu in WordPress
  3. Done!
sections.faq: Use the support link in the menu above of this plugins homepage on wordpress.org if you have any qustions.

short_description: WP Spam IP is a simple and effective WordPress plugin that adds known Spam IP adresses to your Settings -> Discussion -> Comment Blacklist.
description:
WP Spam IP works right away when you activate the plugin. No more settings needed. The IP’s in the plugin will be added automatically to your Comment Blacklist.

When a comment comes from an IP adress located in the Comment Blacklist the comment will be marked as spam right away. The plugin does not delete anything and it is up to you if you want to delete the comment or not.

upgrade_notice: Upgrading provides new compaitiblity with newer versions of WordPress.
